@wp.kernel
def rand_expr_nlxhms(data: wp.array(dtype=float)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    v0 = data[tid]
    v1 = 0.0
    v2 = 1.0
    tmp = 0.0
    tmp = (0.44 / v0)
    v0 = (v1 - wp.abs(wp.exp(v0 + 0.40)))
    tmp = (0.86 + v0)
    v1 = (v1 * v2)
    v1 = 0.66
    v0 = ((v2 * wp.cos(v1 + 0.52)) * (0.87 / wp.abs(v0 + 0.67)))
    tmp = wp.sin((v0 * (v0 + 0.67 + v0 + 0.44)))
    v1 = v0
    data[tid] = v0
